content: When Shungen came down at the end of the first half and saw you, my heart warmed and I hurriedly handed over water
Me: Good work! That was a great shot!
He rubs my head without saying a word and pushes a strand of hair behind his ear
Shungen : The second half is about to start, I'm going to go first, will you stay here with me?
Me: No problem! Go for it! Victory will be yours!
